attributes.action: Restrict or ban the sale of fireworks to the general public
attributes.additional_details: The impact on the above issues are huge. There are no licenses or restrictions in place to monitor or ban the use of fireworks used by any member of the general public causing irresponsible use and the death of wildlife and pets
attributes.background: To reconsider the sale of fireworks to the general public due to impact on wildlife and pets, noise pollution, climate issues and irresponsible use

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Ban sale of fireworks to the public and limit sales to licensed displays only: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/616868

Require a licence to buy or release any fireworks: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/626683
